mkac 1.1
  • Reference

display calculations for sum in adjustment for autocorrelation (mainly for debugging)

sum_df.Rd

display calculations for sum in adjustment for autocorrelation (mainly for debugging)

sum_df(x, ...)

Arguments

x

numeric, a time series
...,

optional arguments for acf

Value

data frame showing terms in sum

Examples

set.seed(457298)
xx=stats::arima.sim(list(ar=0.8),100) # posoitively autocorrelated, sample size ratio > 1
sum_df(xx)
#>              v   n lags   sig      term     cumul   scaled
#> 1   1.00000000 100    0  TRUE 970200.00       0.0 1.000000
#> 2   0.78057306 100    1  TRUE 734592.62  734592.6 2.514312
#> 3   0.57306331 100    2  TRUE 522963.82 1257556.4 3.592365
#> 4   0.42732973 100    3  TRUE 378032.97 1635589.4 4.371654
#> 5   0.34517252 100    4  TRUE 295909.50 1931498.9 4.981651
#> 6   0.25211821 100    5  TRUE 209381.65 2140880.6 5.413277
#> 7   0.15402340 100    6 FALSE 123875.48 2140880.6 5.413277
